Traité des sources de la corruption qui règne aujourd'hui parmi les Chrestiens. English

notesStmt.note: Translation of: Traité des sources de la corruption qui règne aujourd'hui parmi les Chrestiens.

Part 1: p. 19-22, 35-39, 59-62 are tightly bound in filmed copy. Pages from beginning-60 photographed from Dr. Williams' library copy and inserted at the end of pt. 2. Pt. 2, p. 240-244 are missing in filmed copy. Pages 240-255 photographed from Yale University copy and inserted at the end.
Reproduction of original in British Library (pt. 1) and Dr. Williams' Library (pt. 2).
